info.name: Evan Feliza
info.title: Frontend Developer
info.about: As a computer engineering graduate with a strong foundation in algorithms and systems thinking, I've successfully transitioned into web development with focused expertise in modern frontend technologies. Over the past year of freelancing, I've refined my ability to translate complex technical concepts into performant, intuitive interfaces - blending engineering rigor with user-centric design principles.

projects.title: Barangay Inhabitant Viewer

projects.title: Mobo Market
projects.description: Mobo Market is an e-commerce demo web application that aims to showcase the usage of APIs specifically Fake Store API. With the use of NextJS 14, this app demonstrates the usage of new features of Next JS such intercepted routes, parallel routes. This app also uses middlewares for authentication. With the help of shadcn UI the app showcases beautiful components.

projects.title: Crypto Checker
projects.description: CryptoChecker is a web application that is powerded by CoingeckoAPI. This enable users to browse crypto currency coins with the latest prices, rankings and coin information.
